name: Stegosaurs
description:
Stegosaurs is a lo-res (64px X 64px) game for Apple Mac and Windows PC thats all about clicking on your Stegosaurs and gathering hearts. 

As Stegosaurs love you more and more they will eventually give you even more heart power per heart when you click on them! And as you get more heart power you will find more and more eggs to hatch into more and more unique and exciting Stegosaurs!

Stegosaurs was designed and developed by William Anderson, with help from Brendan Byrne and his Destiny Clock for background music composition.

Stegosaurs is super easy to play, you can do it in just 3 easy steps!
